title: Building Scalable RAG Systems with AWS
excerpt: Learn how to build production-ready Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems using AWS Lambda, Pinecone, and Bedrock for enterprise-scale applications.
content:
# Building Scalable RAG Systems with AWS

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) has become a cornerstone of modern AI applications. In this post, I'll walk through building a production-ready RAG system using AWS services.

## Architecture Overview

Our system uses AWS Lambda for serverless compute, Pinecone for vector storage, and AWS Bedrock for LLM inference...
